titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to decrease the distance away from home required for a member of a reserve component of the Armed Forces to be eligible for the above-the-line deduction for travel expenses.
Savings for Servicemembers Act
Savings for Ser­vice­mem­bers Act
Savings for Servicemembers Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Savings for Servicemembers Act
This bill reduces from 100 miles to 50 miles the distance away from home required for a member of a reserve component of the Armed Forces to be eligible for the above-the-line tax deduction for travel expenses. (Above-the-line tax deductions are subtracted from gross income to arrive at adjusted gross income.)
